Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 9; O1: 7; O2: 7; O3: 7; O4: 6; O5: 6; O6: 6; O7: 6; O8: 6; O9: 6 Spell DC: O: 13
Spells:
Breath Of Life (O5 Conj): Touched corpse dead less than 1 rd resurrected and heals 5d8+20 HP
Detect Undead (O1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on undead auras for conc or 20 min
Greater Restoration (O7 Conj): Touch dispels magical ability harm and heals all temporary ability damage, restores all drained abilities, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores all drained levels
Heal (O6 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 150 HP and removes negative conditions
Lesser Restoration (O2 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched or heals 1d4 temporary ability damage, removes fatigue, and reduces exhaustion
Mass Heal (O9 Conj): R75' Targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 150 HP and remove negative conditions
Neutralize Poison (O4 Conj): Touched neutralized 200 min, immunized, or detoxified
Restoration (O4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level
True Resurrection (O9 Conj): Fully restores target dead up to 200 yr
Magic Notes:
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 10d6 HP (DC 23 Will half) 4/dy
Combat Healer: May use two spell slots to cast Cure spell as a swift action 4/dy
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Enhanced Cures: Caster level bonus for Cure spells is +20
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Safe Curing: Cure spells do not provoke AOO
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Spirit Boost: Up to 20 excess HP from a Cure spell become temporary HP for 1 rd
